courses.title: Full-Stack Web Development (MERN Stack)
courses.courseIntroduction: This course takes you from a beginner to a full-stack web developer. You will learn both frontend and backend development using modern technologies. The course includes hands-on projects to build real-world applications. You will master MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js (MERN stack). Authentication, routing, and deployment are covered in detail. By the end, you'll have the skills to create scalable web apps and showcase a complete portfolio.

courseOverview.brief: In this course, you will gain comprehensive knowledge of web development using the MERN stack. You'll understand how the frontend and backend work together to build dynamic applications. Real-world projects will prepare you for industry challenges.

tabs.Designed For: Beginners to intermediate learners who want to become web developers.
Projects: Build a complete e-commerce website with authentication, payments, and admin panel.

instructor.name: Salman Sadik
instructor.bio: Salman has worked with multiple startups and enterprises to build scalable web applications. He enjoys mentoring students and sharing industry best practices.

courses.title: App Development with Flutter (Android & iOS)
courses.courseIntroduction: Learn how to create beautiful and fast cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter & Dart. This course covers Flutter widgets, state management, and API integration. You'll build real-world apps that work on Android and iOS. Firebase backend integration will teach you how to handle databases, authentication, and storage. You'll also learn deployment strategies and app performance optimization. By the end, you'll have the skills to publish apps on both Google Play Store and Apple App Store.

courseOverview.brief: You’ll begin with the fundamentals of Dart and Flutter, then move to creating powerful, scalable apps with state management, Firebase integration, and clean UI/UX design. Real-world app projects like Firebase-based apps, API integration, and navigation systems will be built to sharpen your portfolio and make you job-ready.

Curriculum: Creating Beautiful UI With Flutter for Beginners
Leveraging Flutter Packages to Speed Up Development
Flutter App with Live Web Data
tabs.Designed For: Students and developers who want to create cross-platform apps with a single codebase.
tabs.Open Job Positions: 8,000+ jobs globally in Flutter app development.
Projects: Develop a cross-platform mobile app for food delivery with Firebase backend.
